title: Big South Fork National River & Recreation Area: Education
body: The Big South Fork: A wild Classroom Wildlife and wild lands holds adventure for your students, whether you're able to visit in person, or not. Find lesson plans, plan your field trip, and more as you use Big South Fork National River and Recreation Area as your classroom. Look to the park for your own professional development needs.   Contact the Environmental Education Office at 423-286-9059, or by e-mail.
